equation:
\begin{equation}
L^d_n(w;T) = 
- 2 n k^{2n-d+1} \pi^{-\frac{d}{2}+1} \Gamma \left( \frac{d}{2} \right) 
 T \sum_m
\int d^{d-1} \vec{q}~~ \frac{\partial P_{k}}{ \partial k} 
(P_{k} + w\,k^2)^{-(n+1)}, 
\label{fourfive} \

\begin{equation}
    \frac{\partial }{\partial t}u'_{k}(\tilde{\rho}) =
      -2 u'_k+\tilde{\rho} u''_k  +v_3 \left(3u''_k+2\tilde{\rho} u'''_k\right)
      L^3_1\left( u'_k+2\tilde{\rho} u''_k\right)
     +3v_3\, u''_k \,L^3_1\left(u'_k\right),
\label{scinv} \

\begin{equation}
I_F(\rho;T,0) = N_c \frac{h^2}{12} T^2 
+N_c \frac{h^4}{16\pi^2} \rho 
\ln \left( \frac{\Lambda^2}{\alpha T^2}\right)
+{\cal O}( h^6),
\label{mu0} \
